verses.text: Ach to jelan ach t'a owal, Â¿tas yuj tzik'chaanh a b'ha t'a a chukal? Ha swach'k'olal Dios aynhejek' t'a smasanil tiempo.
Anhej chukal a gana tza k'ulej. Ha a ti' tzak'lab'ej t'a lolonel manh yeloc, icha wal junok k'een cuchilub' te jay ye syak'lab'ej junok anima smil-lab'oc.
Ha chukal a gana t'a yichanh wach'il. Ha lolonel es a gana t'a yichanh lolonel yel.
Ach anima chab' sat, a wal lolonel yic tz'ixtan anima a gana.
Palta ha Dios ol ach satanel t'a junelnhej. Ol och yub'naj t'ayach, ol ach yik'ancanel t'a a pat, ol yik'anel a k 'inal.
Ha heb' sk'anab'ajan Dios ol yil jun tik heb', ol xiv heb' t'ay, palta ol b'uchwaj heb' t'a jun winh chuk chi'.
Ol yalan heb': Ilec wal winh maj ak'anoch Dios yipoc sk'ool. Anhej wal t'a niwac b'eyumal ix yak'och sk'ol winh, aynhejoch spensar winh sk'ulan chukal, xcham heb'.
Ha inxo tik, lajan in icha junok te' oliwo te yaax, wach' sq'uib' t'a yamaq'uil stemplo Dios. Anhej swach'k'olal Dios ol wak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Ach in Diosal, ol wak'nhej yuj diosal yuj a wach'k'olal t'ayin. Tzach wak'nhejoch yipoc in k'ool yujto wach' ach. Ol walel ab'ixal t'a yichanh heb' icxo, to toxonton wach' ach.
